title: All-Time Greatest Horror OST's
description:
Greetings, my children. Here, culled from dozens of old CD's and assorted torrents, are my favorite soundtracks from the horror genre. They include:


Army of Darkness
Carrie (Expanded Soundtrack)
Christine
Dracula
Event Horizon
Ghost Story
Grindhouse - Death Proof
Grindhouse - Planet Terror
Halloween (20th Anniversary Edition)
Halloween (best of 1-6)
Halloween (2007 remake)
In The Mouth Of Madness
Phantasm
Phantasm II
Phantasm IV 
Prince of Darkness (Expanded Soundtrack)
Tales from the Crypt - Demon Knight
The Shining
The Thing
Underworld (orchestral score)
Underworld (soundtrack)
Underworld-Evolution (soundtrack)
Vampires

Enjoy -- and, as always, keep seeding!
